title: Photo Of The Day: Motocross Insanity at Journey’s
author: Christy Frink
contentEncoded:
This shot from the motocross demo at Journey’s Backyard BBQ on Saturday comes to us courtesy of relic57, who had much better luck than we did at capturing the more impressive stunts of the day on film. We were way too enamored with the fact that there was nothing but pavement below these guys, but we’re glad someone thought to take out their camera.
